animeTitle: Top wo Nerae! & Top wo Nerae 2! Gattai Movie!!
animeDescription: This double feature comprises of Gunbuster and Die Buster (aka Gunbuster 2) condensed into a single theatrical release told in two parts with a musical intermission in between. The first part, Gunbuster the Movie, condenses the six episodes of the original OVA into a 95-minute movie featuring a new 5.1 audio remix and a redub by the original Japanese cast. The second part, Die Buster the Movie, mixes large chunks of the second OVA series with a few altered or newly-animated scenes to create a truncated take on Nono's story.(Source: ANN)
animeCharacters: ['Takaya, Noriko', 'Nono', "Melk Mark, Lal'C", 'Amano, Kazumi', 'Oota, Kouichirou', 'Freud, Jung', 'Hatori']
animeStaff: [['Anno, Hideaki', 'Producer, Storyboard, Key Animation, Screenplay'], ['Takeda, Yasuhiro', 'Producer'], ['Inoue, Hiroaki', 'Producer'], ['Nishigori, Atsushi', 'Episode Director, Key Animation, Animation Director']]
